DOC.brief_summary: The goal investigator-initiated study determine whether fortification orange juice vitamin D , vitamin A , vitamin E enhance vitamin D , vitamin A , vitamin E status child age 6-10 see Division Pediatrics Boston University Medical Center . Circulating concentration 25-hydroxyvitamin D [ 25 ( OH ) D ] , vitamin A , vitamin E , measure mid-intervention ( week 6 ) , period twelve week . This study plan recruit 180 male female subject age 6 10 . An informed consent explain discussed subject parents/guardians willing participate study . The study twelve week . Blood drawn initial visit , mid-intervention ( week 6 ) , week 12 . Dietary intake assess baseline conclusion 12-week intervention use 3-day food record . The subject randomize double-blinded manner via electronically shuffle list . Subjects randomize receive one three beverage : ( 1 ) calcium plus vitamin D fortify orange juice ( intervention A ) , ( 2 ) calcium plus vitamin D , A , E fortify orange juice ( intervention B ) ( 3 ) calcium-only fortified orange juice ( control ) . Subjects group drink two 8-oz . glass juice least six hour apart ( morning afternoon ) per day period 12 week . Subjects randomize intervention A receive 200 IU vitamin D 700 mg calcium per day 2 glass juice , intervention B receive 200 IU vitamin D , 12 IU vitamin E , 2000 IU vitamin A beta carotene , 700 mg calcium per day 2 glass juice , control receive 700 mg calcium per day 2 glass juice . A blood sample obtain subject begin drink orange juice week 12 determine level 25 ( OH ) D measure vitamin D status . Blood also use determine osteocalcin , parathyroid hormone ( PTH ) , alkaline phosphatase , phosphorus , calcium , C-telopeptide ( CTX ) , albumin , vitamin A , vitamin E. A blood sample also obtain week 6 25 ( OH ) D PTH .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Controlled Trial Testing The Effect Of A Multi-Nutrient Fortified Juice
DOC.detailed_description: This investigator-initiated double-blinded study one hundred eighty male female subject age 6 10 recruit Division Pediatrics Boston University Medical Center . Potential volunteer undergo screen process ensure inclusion exclusion criterion meet . A general medical history take study start . A baseline biochemical profile ( blood ) include calcium , phosphorus , osteocalcin , alkaline phosphatase , C-telopeptide ( CTX ) , 25 ( OH ) D , PTH , albumin , vitamin A , vitamin E determine study complete . The amount blood estimate drawn first visit 27 ml . Dietary intake assess 3 day food record via NDS-Minnesota Database Dr. Christine Economos , Friedman School Nutrition Science Policy Tufts University . Once subject meet inclusion criterion , he/she receive two gallon orange juice via delivery service home . He/she instruct drink two 8 oz . glass orange juice day record glass juice drunk ; sticker calendar provide . A delivery service use deliver juice parents/caregiver biweekly . Signature log sheet delivery maintain . A glass mark designate eight ounce provide subject amount orange juice drunk measure . Sixty subject receive intervention A , sixty subject receive intervention B , sixty subject receive intention C. Subjects randomize intervention A receive juice contain 200 IU vitamin D 700 mg calcium per day . Subjects randomize intervention B receive 200 IU vitamin D , 12 IU vitamin E , 2000 IU vitamin A beta-carotene , 700 mg calcium per day . Subjects randomize intervention C receive 700 mg calcium per day . A venous blood sample 27 ml [ two red top tube ( 10ccs ) one purple top tube ( 7ccs ) ] obtain initial final visit . 25 ( OH ) D , PTH , calcium , phosphorus , osteocalcin , C-telopeptide ( CTX ) , alkaline phosphatase , albumin , vitamin A , vitamin E measure blood sample . During mid-intervention blood draw ( week 6 ) 10mL blood drawn 25 ( OH ) D PTH measure . The study consist 12 week drink two eight-ounce glass orange juice day ( one one pm ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female child race age 6 10 1 . History rickets 2 . History intestinal malabsorption ( i.e . Cystic Fibrosis , Fat Malabsorption Syndrome , Crohn 's Disease ) 3 . History severe medical illness , include renal failure ( decrease 2/3 kidney function ) 4 . Allergies orange juice 5 . Any medical condition advisable receive two 8 oz . glass orange juice per day 6 . History Diabetes 7 . Currently take , take less one month prior start study , prescription vitamin D 8 . Unwilling consent/assent trial
